类的使用
org.springframework.scheduling.config.TriggerTask

  • 使用TriggerTask的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.scheduling.config
    Support package for declarative scheduling configuration, with XML schema being the primary configuration format.

    • org.springframework.scheduling.config中TriggerTask的使用

      org.springframework.scheduling.config中TriggerTask的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  CronTask
      TriggerTask implementation defining a Runnable to be executed according to a standard cron expression.
      返回变量类型为TriggerTask的类型的org.springframework.scheduling.config中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.util.List<TriggerTask> ScheduledTaskRegistrar.getTriggerTaskList()
      Get the trigger tasks as an unmodifiable list of TriggerTask objects.
      参数类型为TriggerTask的org.springframework.scheduling.config中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void ScheduledTaskRegistrar.addTriggerTask(TriggerTask task)
      Add a TriggerTask.
      ScheduledTask ScheduledTaskRegistrar.scheduleTriggerTask(TriggerTask task)
      Schedule the specified trigger task, either right away if possible or on initialization of the scheduler.
      类型变量类型为TriggerTask的org.springframework.scheduling.config中的方法参数 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void ScheduledTaskRegistrar.setTriggerTasksList(java.util.List<TriggerTask> triggerTasks)
      Specify triggered tasks as a list of TriggerTask objects.
